text:
A lovely lake to sit by and relax for a while.
It's also great to walk along the side, taking in your surroundings.
There's a nice Swan sculpture in the centre of the lake, and on my walk back, there was a Swan floating in the water.
It's also quite clear water, and you get to see the fish

🪽At the centre of this picturesque tranquil lake is an elegantly sculptured "Flight of the Swans" sculpture.
🦢🪿The Swan Lake is home to a pair of beautiful swans.
🪑🍀🍂Visitors can enjoy the tranquil lake lush surroundings, observe the graceful swans and relax on the benches by the lake.
🌿🪑🌤️A stunning Victorian cast-iron Gazebo located at the south of the Lake shade visitors from the natural elements.
Probably one of the best scenery spot in Singapore Botanic Gardens. If you got the right time right weather can see the beautiful lighting and white swan. Be careful don’t fall into the water.
The lake has a Vitorian-era atmosphere, peaceful and shady with beautiful swan sculpture. If any lucky maybe see the living swan swimming in the lake. Not far from Taglin gate.

One of my favourite spots in Singapore, amazing to just absorb the humidity here, watch the animals around including the little turtle coming up for some attention. The Singapore Botanic Gardens are some of the most greenery I have ever seen.
